    Service<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>

    @Produces(value="application/json")
public class JsonNodeService
extends RestService<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>
    Generic Jackson-based service implementation. Extend RestService directly for specific POJO types.
